scripts.compile: bun run --cwd ../typescript-sdk build && bun build --compile src/index.ts --outfile dist/starcite
scripts.prepublishOnly: bun run clean && bun run build
scripts.test:dist: bun run --cwd ../typescript-sdk build && bun run clean && bun run build && node dist/index.js --help > /dev/null
scripts.lint: ultracite check src test package.json tsconfig.json tsup.config.ts vitest.config.ts README.md
scripts.format: ultracite fix src test package.json tsconfig.json tsup.config.ts vitest.config.ts README.md
scripts.check: bun run lint && bun run typecheck && bun run test
